title: A teaser video for the anime "Bocchi the Rock!" collaboration project "The Road to Cable Ties" has been released!
[LIVE footage] "Flashbacker" from "Kyuuzoubando TOUR "We will B"" released!
An illustration by new character designer Oda Keimon has arrived, confirming the production of season 2!
A second season of the anime "Bocchi the Rock!" has been confirmed!
To celebrate the launch of the "Kyuuzou Band TOUR "We will B""! A specially drawn commemorative illustration by illustrator Yusuke Nakamura has arrived!
